statements: SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM credit_card_usage WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage WHERE reward_points_earned > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM credit_card_usage ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM credit_card_usage GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_usage WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM credit_card_usage GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_date) AS unique_dates FROM credit_card_usage GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_dates > 1;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM credit_card_usage GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(amount) > 500;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM credit_card_usage GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE card_number = '1234567890123456';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE rewards_points_earned IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, rewards_points_total FROM customer_rewards WHERE rewards_points_total > 5000;
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_date, transaction_amount, rewards_points_earned FROM credit_card_transactions;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, rewards_points_earned FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT transaction_id, card_number, transaction_date, transaction_amount, rewards_points_earned FROM credit_card_transactions WHERE rewards_points_earned IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_rewards WHERE rewards_points_total >= 500
SELECT customer_id, rewards_points_total FROM customer_rewards ORDER BY rewards_points_total DESC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM Rewards GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM Transactions JOIN Customers ON Transactions.customer_id = Customers.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT customer_name, reward_id, reward_points, reward_date FROM Customers JOIN Rewards ON Customers.customer_id = Rewards.customer_id WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, reward_points, category_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id JOIN categories ON rewards.customer_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, reward_points, category_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id JOIN categories ON rewards.reward_points >= 100 AND rewards.reward_points <= 500 AND rewards.customer_id = categories.category_id;

SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE transaction_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_name, reward_points, category_name FROM customers JOIN rewards ON customers.customer_id = rewards.customer_id JOIN categories ON rewards.reward_points > 500 AND rewards.customer_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY reward_points ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards;
SELECT customer_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards;
SELECT card_number, customer_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, credit_limit FROM credit_cards ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.amount, r.reward_points FROM credit_cards c INNER JOIN transactions t ON c.card_number = t.card_number LEFT JOIN rewards r ON c.card_number = r.card_number;
SELECT c.customer_name, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.card_number WHERE t.amount > 100;

SELECT c.customer_name, t.amount, r.reward_points, cat.category_name FROM credit_cards c JOIN transactions t ON c.card_number = t.card_number LEFT JOIN rewards r ON c.card_number = r.card_number CROSS JOIN categories cat WHERE r.reward_points > 50 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
